item.title: This thing is being really mean!
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

so when its like this

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;
import javax.swing.*;
   public class GUIObjects3 extends JFrame implements ActionListener
   {
       private static GUIObjects3 frame;
       private static JTextField text;
         public static void main(String[] args)
      {


      frame = new GUIObjects3();
      frame.setTitle("GUIObejects");
      frame.setSize(400, 400);
      frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
      frame.setVisible(true);

      }

      public GUIObjects3()
      {
		  setLayout(new BorderLayout());

          JTextField text = new JTextField(10);
          JButton button = new JButton("Pounds to kilograms");
          JButton button1 = new JButton("Pounds to grams");
          JButton button2 = new JButton("How to do it yourself");
          JButton button3 = new JButton("click me");


          JPanel panel = new JPanel();

          panel.setLayout(new FlowLayout());


          panel.add(button);
          panel.add(button1);
          panel.add(button2);
          panel.add(button3);



   add(panel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
      button.addActionListener(this);
       button1.addActionListener(new TextField(10));
        button2.addActionListener(this);
         button3.addActionListener(this);
     }


     public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      {

       JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame, " You pressed " + e.getActionCommand());
       if(mouseEventMask(button1))then add(text)








      }
 }[/code]
i get 
[code]
              ^
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\GUIObjects3.java:58: not a statement
           if(mouseEventMask(button1))then add(text)
                                      ^
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\GUIObjects3.java:58: ';' expected
           if(mouseEventMask(button1))then add(text)
                                           ^
3 errors
Tool completed with exit code 1

Read full topic

item.title: This thing is being really mean!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

this:

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) implements ActionListener;

should be this:

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)

btw, use the code tags, they are there for a reason

Read full topic

item.title: This thing is being really mean!
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

okay soo i made this to convert the pounds to whatever some people have already helped like pwned but now im using GUI's and everything and i cant get it to work so maybe you guys can help

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;
import javax.swing.*;

public class GUIObjects3 extends JFrame implements ActionListener
{
private static GUIObjects3 frame;
private static JTextField text;

     public static void main(String[] args)
      {


      frame = new GUIObjects3();
      frame.setTitle("GUIObejects");
      frame.setSize(400, 400);
      frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
      frame.setVisible(true);

      }

      public GUIObjects3()
      {
		  setLayout(new BorderLayout());


          JButton button = new JButton("Pounds to kilograms");
          JButton button1 = new JButton("Pounds to grams");
          JButton button2 = new JButton("How to do it yourself");
          JButton button3 = new JButton("click me");


          JPanel panel = new JPanel();

          panel.setLayout(new FlowLayout());


          panel.add(button);
          panel.add(button1);
          panel.add(button2);
          panel.add(button3);



   add(panel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
      button.addActionListener(this);
       button1.addActionListener(new TextField(10));
        button2.addActionListener(this);
         button3.addActionListener(this);
     }


      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) implements ActionListener;
      {

       JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame, " You pressed " + e.getActionCommand());
       if(mouseEventMask(button1));








      }
 }

i get C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\GUIObjects3.java:54: ';' expected
public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) implements ActionListener;
^
1 error

Tool completed with exit code 1

this error
